<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H2135|זָכָה]]</big>**</small>
 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎זָכוּ‎</span> ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 61, 4</sup>) **noun feminine** ==purity, innocence== (compare Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זָכָה‎</span>, also [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎דְּכָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be clean*** (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> is ***be bright*** (of fire), ***acute*** (of mind), etc.), or Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">. ***be pure, good***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎זְכָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be pure, innocent***; are these forms with <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ז‎</span> secondary? or ancient \|\| ?); — absolute <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎ז‎</span> [[Dan.6.13|Dan 6:13]] ***innocence*** in God's sight.
